b.font: Volatile data structures remain in DRAM.

font.b: Column Store Main moves to Persistent Memory

p.font: - More than 95% of data in most HANA Systems.

- Loading of tables into memory at startup becomes
obsolete

switch.text: Column Store Main moves to Persistent Memory...
